goods.name: orange
goods.description: An orange is a type of citrus fruit. Oranges are a very good source of Vitamin C.

goods.name: apple
goods.description: An apple is a fruit that people often eat.

goods.name: melon
goods.description: Melons are rounded or elongate, of yellow or green rind, sometimes combined depending on the variety.

goods.name: cherry
goods.description: The fruit is a fleshy drupe that is generally heart-shaped to nearly globular, about 2 cm (1 inch) in diameter, and varies in colour from yellow through red to nearly black.

goods.name: avocado
goods.description: Avocado fruits have greenish or yellowish flesh with a buttery consistency and a rich, nutty flavour.

goods.name: grape
goods.description: Grapes are fleshy, rounded fruits that grow in clusters made up of many fruits of greenish, yellowish or purple skin.

goods.name: peach
goods.description: A peach is a very sweet, juicy fruit with an edible peel and a hard pit in the middle.

goods.name: lemon
goods.description: The lemon is a round, slightly elongated fruit, it has a strong and resistant skin, with an intense bright yellow colour.

goods.name: banana
goods.description: Banana is an elongated usually tapering tropical fruit with soft pulpy flesh enclosed in a soft usually yellow rind a bunch of bananas slipped on a banana peel.

goods.name: mango
goods.description: Mango is a tropical usually large ovoid or oblong fruit with a firm yellowish-red skin, hard central stone.

goods.name: strawberry
goods.description: Strawberries are soft, sweet, bright red berries.

goods.name: kiwi
goods.description: The ellipsoidal kiwi fruit is a true berry and has furry brownish green skin.
